de.ailis.usb4java.topology

Class Usb4JavaDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ailis.usb4java.topology.Usb4JavaDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.usb.UsbDevice
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Usb4JavaHub, Usb4JavaNonHub

    public abstract class Usb4JavaDevice
extends Object
implements javax.usb.UsbDevice
    usb4java implementation of JSR-80 UsbDevice.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public final USB_Dev_Handle open()
                          throws javax.usb.UsbException
        Opens the USB device and returns the USB device handle. If device was already open then the old handle is returned.
        Returns:
        The USB device handle.
        Throws:
        javax.usb.UsbException - When USB device could not be opened.

      • close

        public final void close()
                 throws javax.usb.UsbException
        Closes the device. If device is not open then nothing is done.
        Throws:
        javax.usb.UsbException - When device could not be closed.
